paper.title: A density-based approach for non-heuristic approximations of prime counting functions

chunks.label: Abstract & overview
covers: Non-heuristic approximations for Ï€(n); density of integers not divisible by small primes

chunks.label: Setup & background
covers: Prime counting context; sieve/divisibility motivation; notation

chunks.label: Density-based estimator construction
covers: Definition of estimator (products over primes); expected counts in intervals

chunks.label: Claims about error bounds / asymptotics
covers: Bounded cumulative error claim; asymptotic comparisons

chunks.label: Applications to prime families
covers: Dirichlet primes; twin prime estimates; related counting functions
